flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday Buddy has 30/2 = <<30/2=51>>51 baseball cards.
On Wednesday Buddy has 51+12 = <<51+12=63>>63 baseball cards.
On Thursday Buddy buys 51/3 = <<51/3=17>>17 baseball cards.
On Thursday Buddy has a total of 63+17 = <<63+17=80>>80 baseball cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
